channel.title: How do i change combat lvl?
channel.description: how do i change the combat lvl max lvl from 99 to 135

item.title: How do i change combat lvl?
item.dc:creator: @noty noty
item.description:
@noty wrote:

  1. Go To Client.Java
  2. CTRL+F And Search For “Return 99”
  3. You Will See This:

[Code]
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;
	if (exp > 13034430)
		return 99;
	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
				* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;[/code]
  1. Choose A Max Level Put The Level There It Says

return 99;
5. You Need XP To, So You Can Choose How Much XP You Need, For Maybe 135 You Only Put From

13034430
To

20000000

-Pax
